product_name: CliniqueClarifying Face Lotion 1.0 Twice A Day Exfoliator
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Clarifying Face Lotion 1.0 Twice A Day Exfoliator is a dermatologist-developed, alcohol-free exfoliator for all skins. Gentle formula helps reveal fresher skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Mild, non-drying lotion helps soothe, de-flake, smooth, and protect natural moisture.Leaves skin radiant and ready for treatments to follow.Dermatologist-developed.Create great skin with Clinique's twice-daily 3-Step Skincare System developed by a celebrated dermatologist.It's simple: cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ or oil-free Gel. Each step is customized for your skin type.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesFragranceItem 2307568How To UseUse lotion twice a day, morning and night after cleansing. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips. Follow with Step 3: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+, Gel or Cream.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Biosaccharide Gum - 1, Butylene Glycol, Acetyl Glucosamine, Glycerin, Sucrose, Salicylic Acid, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate 20, Trehalose, Capryloyl Glycine, Disodium Phosphate, Trisodium EDTA, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use lotion twice a day, morning and night after cleansing. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips. Follow with Step 3: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+, Gel or Cream.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: A Must for Daily Routine
reviews.comments: Great product.  Cleanses perfectly after washing your face.  Leaves skin feeling fantastic.

reviews.headline: Produced worked great
reviews.comments: I would recommend it

reviews.headline: I would never buy this again
reviews.comments: Hate it

reviews.headline: 100% Satisfied
reviews.comments: I had struggled with acne since my teens. I had the ugly boils that were under the skin awful. I tried everything even accurate nothing worked. One day on vacation I went into ulta for mascara and a Clinique lady came up to me and asked if she could show me a picture it was a girl with acne like mine and she said Clinique helped me her skin was beautiful. She showed me this and the gentle foam cleanser I no longer have acne issues I love this.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: This purchase was for my Great Niece and she loves it.

reviews.headline: Best exfoliator
reviews.comments: I have extremely dry and sensitive skin and this is the only toner/exfoliator tgat has ever worked for my skin. It preps my skin great fir makeup and I even use it on my clients when I do a makeover because its the only thing that will help with patchiness.

reviews.headline: Not bad at all
reviews.comments: I purchased this product a while ago from a different store and returned it after my skin became irritated. I wanted to give it another try after finding a Clinique face soap that works wonders. This time around, I love the results.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I can feel a difference when using the toner. it doesn't take much so it lasts a while. my only suggestion is having some kind of a better distribute. it'd be nice if it had where you could squrt a little bit on a cotton ball.

reviews.headline: I will purchase again.
reviews.comments: It leaves my skin feeling refreshed.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this again.
reviews.comments: It doesn't work nor does it work with other products I plan to implement.

reviews.headline: Perfect for me
reviews.comments: I have flaky skin from trentinoin and this has been perfect for smoothing and removing flakes before skincare/makeup. I appreciate how gentle and effective it is, there's no burning or sensitivity after using twice a day. Would definitely recommend this as an exfoliator for someone with super dry/sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Creates bright soft clean skin!
reviews.comments: Absolutely great for mature, drying skin. I am middle aged and decided to try the 1.0 Clarifying Lotion from Clinique again. When I was younger I always used number 3 and then 2. And then I stopped using it. But my mature skin still needs the cell turnover that creates bright and soft looking skin. And this alcohol free version is fantastic. It gives my skin a very clean look and after 2 weeks of once daily use I looked younger. Yeah!! Twice a week I replace it with the Clarifying do-over peel. That's another great product to promote cell turnover and create beautiful skin.

reviews.headline: Great For Dry Skin
reviews.comments: This is the one for dry skin

reviews.headline: I would recommend this to anybody!
reviews.comments: I love this product. I don't have to do much with it. I have combination skin but mostly Dry, and this has renewed my skin and it looks so pretty. I have only been using it a week but so far I love it and it will be apart of my daily until something better comes up.

reviews.headline: Must buy!!
reviews.comments:
Love love love
My skin feels tights and moisturized, not dry or greasy and so fresh. Notice a difference in skin texture too and brightness!

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again and again!!
reviews.comments: For a long time I was scared to incorporate an exfoliant into my routine, because I have VERY dry, flaky, and super sensitive skin. My skin has gotten to the point that it was screaming it needs help exfoliating. The Clinique consultant at Ulta recommended me this product, and with it being 50% off at the time I decided to give it a go. It's amazing! It's SUPER gentle, non-drying, and doesn't make my skin feel right afterwards at all. No burning whatsoever, it just feels like water honestly. My skin feels super soft after using and looks glowing. I should have bought both bottles! Highly recommend for all my super dry and sensitive skin girlies.

reviews.headline: Bring back the mild formulation!
reviews.comments: I used the mild clarifying lotion for years back to when it was called the aloe based clarifier. This product is not even close to that product. Instead of camping my rosacea it causes it to flare up. It also causes patches of dryness on my face. Please bring back the old product and stop trying to pass this one off as the replacement.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I've been using Clinique toner 1 for years but this is the first time trying this version.  I love it.  Doesn't dry my super dry skin and has a slight exfoliating property to it.  My skin feels and looks good after using.  I will be buying this product from now on.

reviews.headline: I would buy thus product again.
reviews.comments: I'm allergic to alot of products but clinque haas never failed me

reviews.headline: I will definitely purchase again when needed!
reviews.comments:
A big thank you to Rose Mary the consultant in Ulta of Florence SC..
She was absolutely the best.. Everything that she selected for me to try was perfect..
The clarifying Lotion is a great asset to my skincare routine.

media.headline: I would purchase the Clarifying lotion 1.0. It has aloe Vera
media.caption: Clinique Top Sales

media.headline: I would purchase the Clarifying lotion 1.0. It has aloe Vera
media.caption: Channel make over

faceoff_positive.comments: I had written a review previously on this product that wasn't very flattering. It was based on a sample I received at my local Clinique counter. However, I think the consultant accidentally put a different (stronger) clarifying lotion in the container (or, perhaps it was contaminated in some way since it came from the counter's sample bottle), because I recently purchased a brand new bottle from the store (thinking I'd give it another try), and so far I have had no problems with it whatsoever. It seems very gentle and mild with no noticeable smell. I have very sensitive rosacea-prone skin, and I have experienced NO redness, itching, dryness or irritation. In fact, my skin feels soft, hydrated, and it actually has a glow to it. All I've been using is the extra mild cleanser, the 1.0 exfoliator, and the Dramatically Different cream in the jar twice a day. I'm so glad I gave this product another chance!. If Clinique does decide to bring back the old version of this product due to customer demand, I hope they will continue making this version as well for those of us who now don't want to be without it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Changed My Mind

faceoff_negative.comments: I realize writing this review is likely pointless - the old version of the mild clarifying lotion is gone, and never coming back. But just in case Clinique reads this review, I want them to know that the previous mild lotion was the only product I ever found that completely cleared up my acne and gave me great skin. For seven years, it was the magic bullet in my skin routine. Instead of curing my acne, this new lotion makes me break out. To say I'm disappointed is an extreme understatement.
faceoff_negative.headline: I realize writing this review is likely pointless - the old
